title: Djokovic Dominates
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss where Djokovic’s Wimbledon win places him in the present and future history of tennis, Greg Norman not being invited to the British Open while LIV golfers are allowed, and if the MLB should tweak rules to save starting pitchers. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: PTI: What Djokovic's Wimbledon win means and Greg Norman doesn't get an invite.
